question: Which institution has developed a low-cost technology to produce anti-ageing compounds?
explanation:
Researchers at the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Guwahati, have developed a technology to produce anti-ageing compounds.
It is a low-cost membrane technology to produce psychoactive drugs and anti-ageing compounds from wide range of agricultural resources like citrus fruits and peels. The water extracts of the plants, fruits or leaves at optimum operating conditions are used in the process.
